PUBLIC



Dear Arun,

 

Thanks for the detailed claim bill.

 

We have registered the claim under reference 23/MO/17972

 

We note that this is an international shipment under FCA terms. In view of this, may we request for the following:

*	Air way bill
*	Customs Documents (from source and destination)
*	Proof of delivery
*	When and where the shortage was noticed?
